record.id: field.name="use.min.pwd.life" and file.name="info" and term=NULL and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: use.min.pwd.life
record.file.name: info

detail.detail: No Min Life Time: If selected (set to true), indicates that no minimum lifetime should be set for a password. If you select this option, select No Max Life Time, as well.

Use Time Period: If selected (set to true), uses a time period to determine the minimum lifetime of a password. Selecting this option displays a field where you can define your choice. Use the same time period for Password Max lifetime.
Use Number of Logins: If selected (set to true), uses the number of logins to determine the maximum lifetime of a password. Selecting this option displays a field where you can define your choice.
